title: RANKED PROVISIONALS DODGE
body:
hello senoritas, my boy pablo agustas was wondering what happened if you dodge one of your placement/provisional games at beginning of season.

pliz help senorita xD jajajajaja

replies.body: Im pretty sure if you dodge your placements it will put you in a really low ranking. Im not 100% sure if this is what happens but its what i heard personally.
Nothing bad, just a longer wait on ranked queues as far as I know. {{champion:39}}
